text: Fan Hongbin (范红斌; born 13 May 1975) is a Chinese gymnast. He competed at the 1996 Summer Olympics in Atlanta, winning a silver medal in men's team competition. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of China Category:Olympic silver medalists for China Category:Gymnasts at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic medalists in gymnastics Category:Asian Games medalists in gymnastics Category:Gymnasts at the 1994 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:Medalists at the 1994 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the World Artistic Gymnastics Championships
title: Fan Hongbin
